name: Temporal Tether Tennis
description:
Welcome to the ultimate virtual Swingball experience! 

In Temporal Tether Tennis, test your lightning-fast reactions to hit back the ball as it comes towards you in slow motion.  

The objective is to keep hitting the ball back until the string reaches the top of the screw! Move the yellow cursor into the circle that will appear in a random position, then swing the bat before the ball goes past.

This game was submitted for the Grads in Games Search for a  Star programming challenge 2023.

 Participating students were given a base project made with UE5 and C++ and were required to adapt the existing code into a game. Please check out the documentation below if you want to find out more.

Keybindings: ActionKeyboard ControlsGamepad ControlsMove the bat cursor[W] [A] [S] [D][Left Stick]Hit the ball back[Enter] [Spacebar][A] [X] [R-Trigger]Pan the camera[Arrow Keys][Right Stick]Exit the game[Esc][Start]

If you enjoyed the soundtrack, you can find all of my video game music compositions on my Soundcloud.

Special thanks to  Hugo and Dan for being forever helpful in the Grads in Games  Discord server.
